original_text: Then a man called Jairus came to see him. He was a leader at the Jewish meeting place. He went down on his knees at the feet of Jesus and said, ‘Please come to my house.
korean_text: 이에 회당장인 야이로라 하는 사람이 와서 예수의 발 아래에 엎드려 자기 집에 오시기를 간구하니

sentences.original_text: Then a man called Jairus came to see him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 야이로라는 한 사람이 그를 만나러 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He was a leader at the Jewish meeting place
He went down on his knees at the feet of Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예수님의 발 앞에 무릎을 꿇었습니다

sentences.original_text: and said, 'Please come to my house'
